definition: Taxol (a.k.a. Paclitaxel), mitotic inhibitor used in cancer chemotherapy
alcohol/wine with high alcohol content/rich/pure/good wine/sterols

sentences.english: Patients also might receive a taxane instead of oxaliplatin.
sentences.chinese: 患者也有可能接受紫杉醇而非奥沙利铂治疗。

sentences.english: IGF pathway inhibition sensitizes drug-resistant ovarian carcinoma cells to Taxol.
sentences.chinese: 抑制IGF通路可使耐药肿瘤细胞重新对紫杉醇敏感。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the therapeutic effects of Palitaxel and Ifosfamide for malignant gynecological tumors.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察紫杉醇与异环磷酰胺治疗妇科肿瘤的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the antiangiogenesis ability of Paclitaxel.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨紫杉醇的抗血管生成作用。

sentences.english: He's the fellow who discovered the fungus which produces the anti-cancer drug Taxol.
sentences.chinese: 他是谁的研究员发现了真菌产生的抗癌药物紫杉醇。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the sensitivity of hyperthermia at different temperatures to taxotere and its mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨不同温热对多西紫杉醇增敏的规律及其机制。

sentences.english: At present, paclitaxel plus carboplatin become the first-line chemotherapeutic regimen of advanced EOC.
sentences.chinese: 紫杉醇加卡铂是晚期EOC的标准一线化疗方案。

sentences.english: The paclitaxel-coated balloons used in this trial were standard angioplasty balloons.
sentences.chinese: 本试验以紫杉醇涂层球囊为血管成形术球囊标准。

sentences.english: Comparatively, Taxus wallichiana is high in Taxol content, and has great medicinal development value.
sentences.chinese: 云南红豆杉紫杉醇含量高，具有较高的药用开发价值。

sentences.english: In addition, the present invention also discloses the preparation process of the docetaxel crystal form.
sentences.chinese: 此外，本发明还公开了该多烯紫杉醇晶型的制备方法。

sentences.english: Objective To establish an HPLC method for determination of the contents in Paclitaxel Injection by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立测定紫杉醇注射液含量的HPLC外标法。

sentences.english: Another 54 people did not receive paclitaxel in any form.
sentences.chinese: 另外54人未接受任何形式的紫杉醇。

sentences.english: Clinical non cross resistance had been demonstrated between TPT and cisplatin or paclitaxel.
sentences.chinese: 临床试验表明，TPT与顺铂和紫杉醇无交叉耐药性。

sentences.english: Taxus yunnanensis is the major species for producing anti-cancer medicine taxol in China.
sentences.chinese: 云南红豆杉是我国生产紫杉醇药物的主要树种。

sentences.english: METHODS PTX-ACM were prepared by dialysis method.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用透析法制备紫杉醇阳离子壳聚糖胶束。

sentences.english: Conclusion Combined chemotherapy of paclitaxel and carboplatin is a good regimen for advanced non-small cell lung cancer with good efficacy and well-tolerated side effects.
sentences.chinese: 结论紫杉醇联合卡铂治疗晚期非小细胞肺癌较好疗效。

definition: Lamivudine, reverse transcriptase inhibitor marketed by GlaxoSmithKline and widely used in the treatment of hepatitis B and AIDS/brand names include Zeffix, Heptovir, Epivir and Epivir-HBV

pinyin: duo1 fa1 xing4 gu3 sui3 liu2

definition: to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
